item.title: Eventful day - but not for me. My parent...
item.description: Eventful day - but not for me. My parents asked my sister (across the street) to use her dryer. She said, “I’m using it.” They said, “You’re not home.” “Yes I am.” “Then where’s your car?” “Outside.” She looked - it was gone. Stolen. 🚗💨 I’ll update if it’s ever found!

item.title: My Battle with Subscription Fatigue: Mid...
item.description: My Battle with Subscription Fatigue: Mid-Year Update https://mitchelltribe.com/2025/08/08/my-battle-with-subscription-fatigue/

item.title: It’s pouring outside right now 🌧️. This ...
item.description: It’s pouring outside right now 🌧️. This has been happening a lot this rainy season. Late-night showers, sometimes mid to late afternoon ☔. It’s helping with the heat at night 🌡️. Now there’s low, rolling, window-shaking thunder too ⛈️. #Florida #rainyseason #weather

item.title: Just found out it’s National Watermelon ...
item.description: Just found out it’s National Watermelon Day! 🍉 Not an official holiday, but definitely a day worth celebrating. I love watermelon, so eat some today!

item.title: I knew his second term would be all abou...
item.description: I knew his second term would be all about retribution and revenge, and now there's economic data manipulation too. This is gonna lead to a fall bigger than the Great Depression. Maybe not today or tomorrow, but before his terms up, it will be someone else's fault. 😬 #politics

item.title: Got my new Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Classi...
item.description: Got my new Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Classic, and I love it! 🎉 The only hiccup's been with Verizon. Swapping it for my Galaxy Watch 6 Classic has been tough. I’m giving them until Monday to sort it out, or I’ll be filing an FCC complaint. 🤞 Fingers crossed! #GalaxyWatch8 #VerizonWireless

item.title: It’s thundering and lightning outside-lo...
item.description: It’s thundering and lightning outside-looks like we're in for a big afternoon thunderstorm! ⚡️🌧️ Check out the view from one of my cameras. The thunder is shaking the house windows!

item.title: Made some changes to my blog at https://...
item.description: Made some changes to my blog at https://michaelleemitchell.net ! Stop on by and let me know what you think if you get the chance. 😊💻 #blog

item.title: The aftermath of a pretty bad thundersto...
item.description: The aftermath of a pretty bad thunderstorm ☔️. Unlike last night, it isn't clearing out fast. This was one of those rough late afternoon thunderstorms 🌩️. #FloridaWeather #AfternoonStorms

item.title: I think this is my last year on Google N...
item.description: I think this is my last year on Google Nest with the price hike. 😕 By the time the live feed pulls up, whatever triggered it is long gone and it takes forever to see it in the activity timeline. Thinking about switching to Eufy! 🏠 #Eufy #GoogleNest

item.title: All day today, I keep thinking it’s Frid...
item.description: All day today, I keep thinking it’s Friday and it feels like a Friday, but it’s really Thursday. So confusing today! 🤔😅

item.title: Beautiful day today before any rain ☀️ b...
item.description: Beautiful day today before any rain ☀️ but hot and a little breeze 🌬️.

item.title: I think Trump thought he could manage or...
item.description: I think Trump thought he could manage or distract from the Epstein files once elected. But I believe he underestimated how much people, especially "his" base, want answers. There are more criminals out there, and they’re on both sides of the aisle. It’s funny, yet really sad, how he’s doing everything and now saying it’s been doctored. But by who? Him and his lackeys. What’s that old saying? He protests too much. What will his base do if he’s not mentioned innocently in the files?

item.title: After the afternoon thunderstorms, it lo...
item.description: After the afternoon thunderstorms, it looks like it's shaping up for a nice evening - cooler and pleasant! 🌤️😊
